logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo22Z97D4V15HXGcurrentClick) { return cv_mo22Z97D4V15HXGcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 9:42 Mins I must apologize for this video. It's not the best work I've ever done but I learned that you can not make a 100mb video from a HD camera no matter how many times you down-convert it. I made this so many times I had about had it. However it should give you a better idea of what you would be getting if you were looking for a small point and shoot. Something I forgot: in the box there is a battery charger that plugs directly into the wall. Thankfully it is small and light and does not come with a big cord like some chargers do. This is the camera case I mentioned in the video: Acme Made AM00887 Sleek Video Case WhitePros:Great pictures for a point and shoot.Easy to operate touch screen.Very compact.Many options for recording. More then you'd ever need.Easy to install and use software.Takes pictures quickly from off to snap.Solid construction.Good zoom on a folded lense.Built-in lens cover.Small battery charger.Video is decent in a pinch.Good battery life.Fantastic price.Cons:Flash might be a little too strong.Easy to drop due to rounded edges.Could use a couple more custom icons.Overall it's a great little camera. Better pictures then you'll get with any smart phone. If you have any questions or comments please leave them below and I'll do my best to reply.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic DMC-FP5
Reviews.Author: J. Cardenas Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: An excellent camera. touch screen on-off button on the screen. WOW. easy to configure, pictures are crisp and clear. You can try a 4 Gb class 6 SDHC, is amazing. Battery charges fast. It takes about 200 pics with flash in one charge. light and easy to manipulate. Face detection. 14 mega pixels, If you have one, Enjoy it. If you don't, buy one. Thanks, AMAZON.COM

Reviews.Title: Wow !
Reviews.Author: Jorge Delgado Bonilla
Reviews.Content: just one word to describe this amazingcamera .... Excellent ! This device exceed my expectations.The zoom is fantastic, the touch screen is excellent and general speaking I mvery satisfied with this. 5 stars !!!

Reviews.Title: When I take the same photos are moved
Reviews.Author: Elias Tejada Gomez
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed with this camera, because I bought it considering all the details of the good features which appeared on the page, but I'm convinced that using it all a lie, when I take the same photos are moved.I feel I've wasted time and money, because I have damaged the best videos and photos of the best moments of my children, that the main reason I decided to buy that camera.I would not recommend buying this camera.Panasonic Lumix DMC-FP5 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3.0-Inch Touch-Screen LCD (Black) Purchased on March 11, 2012)

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: pmar19
Reviews.Content: Comprar esta camaara te ofrece guardar un sinnumero de momentos para recordarlos con alegria y cariño, y asi poder disfrutarlos sin importar el tiempo que haya pasado.
